segments.text: Watching the scene unfold, I feel torn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On one hand, there’s the charm of the woman doing her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water spilling over the sink is a stark reminder of danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t understand how she remains so blissfully unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids, though, are a spectacle of their own.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy teeters on that stool, and I can’t suppress my anger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Does he really think he won’t fall?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl’s excitement is infectious as she reaches for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it’s also alarming; they’re breaking the rules in plain sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen, once a sanctuary, feels like a stage for chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
